atDirectives.name: @import
atDirectives.description: In Tailwind CSS v4, use '@import "tailwindcss";' to include Tailwind's base, components, and utilities styles instead of '@tailwind base;', '@tailwind components;', and '@tailwind utilities;'.

atDirectives.name: @utility
atDirectives.description: Introduced in Tailwind CSS v4, '@utility' is used to define custom utilities, utilizing native CSS cascade layers for better specificity and maintainability.

atDirectives.name: @config
atDirectives.description: Explicitly loads a JavaScript configuration file into your CSS in Tailwind CSS v4, replacing automatic configuration loading from earlier versions.

atDirectives.name: @custom-variant
atDirectives.description: The '@custom-variant' directive allows the creation of custom state variants (e.g., hover, active) in Tailwind CSS v4.

atDirectives.name: @theme
atDirectives.description: Use the '@theme' directive in Tailwind CSS v4 to access CSS variables for theme values directly within your CSS, replacing the older 'theme()' function.
